pageProduct.name: QV Face Gentle Foaming Cleanser 150Ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

QV Face Gentle Foaming Cleanser for normal, dry or sensitive skin has been specially formulated to remove make-up and gently cleanse your skin. This light foaming cleanser is enriched with Vitamin E and Pro Vitamin B5 to leave your skin feeling fresh, soft and moisturised.

Warnings

CAUTION: For external use only.  Avoid contact with eyes.  If lather enters eyes, flush well with water.  Store below 30°C.
Always read the label and use only as directed. 
If symptoms persist see a healthcare professional.

Common Uses

• Effectively removes makeup
• Suitable for normal, dry  or sensitive skin
• Soap free
• pH balanced
• Ophthalmologist tested
• Free from fragrance, colour, lanolin & propylene glycol to reduce the chance of irritation
